column2: ggplot(df2, aes(x = smoking_status, fill = smoking_status)) + geom_bar(stat = "count") + geom_text(aes(label = ..count..), stat = "count", vjust = 1.5, color = "white") + ggtitle("Distribution of Patients that smoke") + scale_fill_manual(values = c("never smoked" = "red", "smokes" = "blue", "formerly smoked" = "darkgreen")) + theme_classic()
